name: Stormlander
description:
Stormlander

Stormlander is a micro-management game with the ultimate goal of escaping using the escape pod. 

In order to achieve your goal, you must methodically place structures around to generate you enough resources to build the escape pod. 

But beware, a sandstorm comes around every minute, that will damage your structures, and take them with it. 

Besides this there will be a constant influx of enemies that have the sole purpose to destroy your buildings. 

Your only defence against these creatures are your weapons. 

Good luck, wanderer.

Controls

-> WASD for movement 

-> Left mouse to shoot

-> Mouse scroll wheel to rotate building.

Switch weapons

-> 1. Rifle

-> 2. Shotgun

-> 3. Arms
